pr_title: Stop submitting logs if rate limit is reached

timeline.message: Stop submitting logs if rate limit is reached
Stop submitting logs if rate limit is reached

timeline.bodyText: nit: rename logger - logs in key
timeline.author: shubham1g5
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -650,6 +650,9 @@ notification.logger.serialized.detail=CommCare had a problem communicating devic
 notification.logger.error.title=Error submitting logs!
 notification.logger.error.detail=CommCare ran into an error trying to submit your device logs to the server! Please contact CommCare Support if this persists.
 
+notification.logger.rate.limited.title=Log Submission rate limit reached.

replies.bodyText:
Do you mean notification.logger.rate.limited.title to notification.logs.rate.limited.title?
Additionally, I tried to be consistent with other keys in enum(all of them have this notification.logger prefix).
replies.author: ShivamPokhriyal

replies.bodyText: got it, no need to change in that case.
replies.author: shubham1g5
